name: tvOS 17.3
available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to decrypt legacy RSA PKCS#1 v1.5 ciphertexts without having the private key
advisories.description: A timing side-channel issue was addressed with improvements to constant-time computation in cryptographic functions.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: fmyy(@binary_fmyy) and lime From TIANGONG Team of Legendsec at QI-ANXIN Group

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with additional restrictions.

cves.credit: Koh M. Nakagawa of FFRI Security, Inc. and an anonymous researcher

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved handling of files.

cves.credit: Noah Roskin-Frazee and Prof. J. (ZeroClicks.ai Lab)

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to corrupt coprocessor memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: An issue was addressed with improved handling of temporary files.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to view a user's phone number in system logs
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

cves.credit: Noah Roskin-Frazee and Prof. J. (ZeroClicks.ai Lab)

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: A maliciously crafted webpage may be able to fingerprint the user
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improved access restrictions.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been exploited.
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: A malicious website may cause unexpected cross-origin behavior
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.
